# The `InstrInfoQuery` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrinfoquery">InstrInfoQuery</a> provides an interface to query additional information for instructions like metadata or keywords like nsw, which provides conservative results if the users specified it is safe to use. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::InstrInfoQuery</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrinfoquery">InstrInfoQuery</a> provides an interface to query additional information for instructions like metadata or keywords like nsw, which provides conservative results if the users specified it is safe to use.
